      Methods in org.strongback.control that return SoftwarePIDController 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SoftwarePIDController SoftwarePIDController.continuousInputs(boolean continuous)
      Sets whether the input range is continuous, meaning it wraps around such as with an encoder.

      SoftwarePIDController SoftwarePIDController.enable() 
      SoftwarePIDController SoftwarePIDController.reset()

      SoftwarePIDController SoftwarePIDController.withGains(double p, double i, double d)
      Set the control gains on this controller's current profile.

      Set the control gains on this controller's current profile.
      SoftwarePIDController SoftwarePIDController.withInputRange(double minimumInput, double maximumInput)
      Sets the maximum and minimum values expected from the input and setpoint.
      SoftwarePIDController SoftwarePIDController.withOutputRange(double minimumOutput, double maximumOutput)
      Sets the maximum and minimum values expected from the input and setpoint.
      SoftwarePIDController SoftwarePIDController.withProfile(int profile, double p, double i, double d) 
      SoftwarePIDController SoftwarePIDController.withProfile(int profile, double p, double i, double d, double feedForward) 
      SoftwarePIDController SoftwarePIDController.withTarget(double setpoint)
      Sets the target value for this controller.
      SoftwarePIDController SoftwarePIDController.withTolerance(double tolerance)
      Sets the absolute tolerance for this controller.
